title: Shawl, "Mendochino", 1990
medium: Technique: orange and black printed in Korea and purple and turquoise overdyed in Clayden's studio
description: Square scarf with unfinished edges and frame built into the design with the signature of designer at lower left corner.

Shawl, "Mendochino", 1990.
1990. Technique: orange and black printed in Korea and purple and turquoise overdyed in Clayden's studio. Gift of Marian Clayden. 1991-87-3.
